member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection
member.summary: Creates a layer of points based on a user-defined neighborhood.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Points used to create a neighborhood selection. (In, Required)
Layer to store the neighborhood selection. (Out, Required)
The neighborhood center's x,y coordinate. (In, Required)
The number of points to use in each sector. If a sector has the required number of points, all points in that sector are used. (In, Required)

The minimum number of points to use in each sector. If the minimum number of required points are not available in any given sector, the nearest available point(s) outside the sector will be selected. (In, Required)
Size of the minor semiaxis of the search neighborhood. (In, Required)
Size of the major semiaxis of the search neighborhood. (In, Required)
The angle of rotation of the neighborhood axis. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.in_dataset
member.summary: Points used to create a neighborhood selection. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.out_layer
member.summary: Layer to store the neighborhood selection. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.point_coord
member.summary: The neighborhood center's x,y coordinate. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.neighbors_max
member.summary: The number of points to use in each sector. If a sector has the required number of points, all points in that sector are used. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.neighbors_min
member.summary: The minimum number of points to use in each sector. If the minimum number of required points are not available in any given sector, the nearest available point(s) outside the sector will be selected. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.minor_semiaxis
member.summary: Size of the minor semiaxis of the search neighborhood. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.major_semiaxis
member.summary: Size of the major semiaxis of the search neighborhood. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.angle
member.summary: The angle of rotation of the neighborhood axis. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GANeighborhoodSelection.shape_type
member.summary: The geometry of the neighborhood. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging
member.summary: Recalculates the Range, Nugget, and Partial Sill semivariogram parameters based on a smaller neighborhood, moving through all location points.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The geostatistical model source to be analyzed. (In, Required)
Input dataset(s) displays two pieces: (In, Required)
Point locations where predictions or validations will be performed. (In, Required)
Number of neighbors to use in the moving window. (In, Required)
Feature class storing the results. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.in_ga_model_source
member.summary: The geostatistical model source to be analyzed. (In, Required)

member.summary: Input dataset(s) displays two pieces: (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.in_locations
member.summary: Point locations where predictions or validations will be performed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.neighbors_max
member.summary: Number of neighbors to use in the moving window. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.out_featureclass
member.summary: Feature class storing the results. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GAMovingWindowKriging.out_surface_grid
member.summary: The Prediction values in the output feature class are interpolated onto a raster using the Local Polynomial Interpolation method. (Out, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity
member.summary: Performs a sensitivity analysis with varying Nugget, Partial Sill, and Range values.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The geostatistical model source to be analyzed. (In, Required)
Input dataset(s) displays two pieces: (In, Required)
Points locations where the sensitivity analysis is performed. (In, Required)
Table storing the sensitivity results. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.in_ga_model_source
member.summary: The geostatistical model source to be analyzed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.in_datasets
member.summary: Input dataset(s) displays two pieces: (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.in_locations
member.summary: Points locations where the sensitivity analysis is performed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.nugget_span_percents
member.summary: The percentage subtracted and added to the Nugget parameter to create a range for subsequent random Nugget parameter selection. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.nugget_calc_times
member.summary: Number of random Nugget values drawn from the Nugget span. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.partialsill_span_percents
member.summary: Percentage subtracted from and added to the Partial Sill parameter to create a range for random Partial Sill selection. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.partialsill_calc_times
member.summary: Number of random Partial Sill values drawn from the Partial Sill span. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.range_span_percents
member.summary: Percentage subtracted and added to the Major Range parameter to create a range for a random Major Range selection. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.range_calc_times
member.summary: Number of random Major Range values drawn from the Major Range span. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.minrange_span_percents
member.summary: Percentage subtracted and added to the Minor Range parameter to create a range for random Minor Range selection. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.minrange_calc_times
member.summary: Number of random Minor Range values drawn from the Minor Range span. If Anisotropy has been set in <in_geostat_layer>, a value is required. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GASemivariogramSensitivity.out_table
member.summary: Table storing the sensitivity results. (Out, Required)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToContour
member.summary: Creates a feature class of coutours from a geostatiscal analysis layer. The output feature class can be either a line feature class of contour lines or a polygon feature class of filled contours.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToContour.#ctor(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The geostatistical layer to be analyzed. (In, Required)
Type of contour to represent the geostatistical layer. (In, Required)
The output feature class will either be a polyline or a polygon, depending on the selected Contour type. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToContour.in_geostat_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer to be analyzed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToContour.contour_type
member.summary: Type of contour to represent the geostatistical layer. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToContour.out_feature_class
member.summary: The output feature class will either be a polyline or a polygon, depending on the selected Contour type. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToContour.contour_quality
member.summary: Determines the smoothness of contour line representation. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints
member.summary: Exports a geostatistical layer to points. The tool can also be used to predict values at unmeasured locations or to validate predictions made at measured locations.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The geostatistical layer to be analyzed. (In, Required)
Point locations where predictions or validations will be performed. (In, Required)
The output feature class containing either the predictions or the predictions and the validation results. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.in_geostat_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer to be analyzed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.in_locations
member.summary: Point locations where predictions or validations will be performed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.z_field
member.summary: If this field is left blank, predictions are made at the location points. If a field is selected, predictions are made at the location points and compared to their Z_value_field values, then a validation analysis is performed. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.out_feature_class
member.summary: The output feature class containing either the predictions or the predictions and the validation results. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GALayerToPoints.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations
member.summary: Performs a conditional or unconditional geostatistical simulation based on a Simple Kriging model.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input a geostatistical layer resulting from a Simple Kriging model. (In, Required)
The number of simulations to perform. (In, Required)
Stores all the simulation results. (In, Required)
A 1- to 3-character alphanumeric prefix that is automatically added to the output dataset names. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.in_geostat_layer
member.summary: Input a geostatistical layer resulting from a Simple Kriging model. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.number_of_realizations
member.summary: The number of simulations to perform. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.output_workspace
member.summary: Stores all the simulation results. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.output_simulation_prefix
member.summary: A 1- to 3-character alphanumeric prefix that is automatically added to the output dataset names. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.in_conditioning_features
member.summary: The features used to condition the realizations. If left blank, unconditional realizations are produced. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.conditioning_field
member.summary: The field used to condition the realizations. If left blank, unconditional realizations are produced. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.in_bounding_dataset
member.summary: Limits the analysis to these features' bounding polygon. If point features are entered, then a convex hull polygon is automatically created. Realizations are then performed within that polygon. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.save_simulated_rasters
member.summary: Determines whether the simulated rasters are saved to disk or not. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.quantile
member.summary: The quantile value for which the output raster will be generated. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.threshold
member.summary: The threshold value for which the output raster will be generated, as the percentage of the number of times the set threshold was exceeded, on a cell by cell basis. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.in_stats_polygons
member.summary: These polygons represent areas of interest for which summary statistics are calculated. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.raster_stat_type
member.summary: The simulated rasters are post-processed on a cell by cell basis and each selected statistics type is calculated and reported in an output raster. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.conditioning_measurement_error_field
member.summary: Specifies a constant measurement error for all input data in the input semivariogram model. Use this field if the measurement error values are not the same at each sampling location. The input's unit of measurement is applied. (In, Optional)

member.summary: Output workspace (out, Optional)

member.summary: Output statistical polygons (out, Optional)

member.summary: Output simulation rasters (out, Optional)

member.summary: Output statistical rasters (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.GaussianGeostatisticalSimulations.out_convergence_value
member.summary: Convergence (out, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures
member.summary: Divides the original dataset into two parts: one part to be used to model the spatial structure and produce a surface, the other to be used to compare and validate the output surface.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Points, lines, or polygon features to create a subset from. (In, Required)
The subset of training features to be created. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures.in_features
member.summary: Points, lines, or polygon features to create a subset from. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures.out_training_feature_class
member.summary: The subset of training features to be created. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures.out_test_feature_class
member.summary: The subset of test features to be created. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures.size_of_training_dataset
member.summary: The size of the output training feature class entered either as a percentage of the input features or as an absolute number of features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.SubsetFeatures.subset_size_units
member.summary: Type of subset size. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW
member.summary: Uses the measured values surrounding the prediction location to predict a value for any unsampled location, based on the assumption that things that are close to one another are more alike than those that are farther apart.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)
Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.in_features
member.summary: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.z_field
member.summary: Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.out_ga_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer produced. This layer is required output only if no output raster is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.out_raster
member.summary: The output raster. This raster is required output only if no output geostatistical layer is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.power
member.summary: The exponent of distance that controls the significance of surrounding points on the interpolated value. A higher power results in less influence from distant points. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.search_neighborhood
member.summary: Defines which surrounding points will be used to control the output. There are two options: STANDARD and SMOOTH. Standard is the default. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.weight_field
member.summary: Used to emphasize an observation. The larger the weight, the more impact it has on the prediction. For coincident observations, assign the largest weight to the most reliable measurement. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.IDW.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation
member.summary: Fits the specified order (zero, first, second, third, and so on) polynomial, each within specified overlapping neighborhoods, to produce an output surface.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)
Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.in_features
member.summary: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.z_field
member.summary: Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.out_ga_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer produced. This layer is required output only if no output raster is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.out_raster
member.summary: The output raster. This raster is required output only if no output geostatistical layer is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.power
member.summary: The order of the polynomial. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.search_neighborhood
member.summary: Defines which surrounding points will be used to control the output. There are two options: STANDARD and SMOOTH. Standard is the default. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.kernel_function
member.summary: The kernel function used in the simulation. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.bandwidth
member.summary: Used to specify the maximum distance at which data points are used for prediction. With increasing bandwidth, prediction bias increases and prediction variance decreases. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.use_condition_number
member.summary: Option to control the creation of prediction and prediction standard errors where the predictions are unstable. This option is only available for polynomials of order 1, 2 and 3. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.condition_number
member.summary: Every invertible square matrix has a condition number that indicates how inaccurate the solution to the linear equations can be with a small change in the matrix coefficients (it can be due to imprecise data) . If the condition number is large, a small change in the matrix coefficients results in a large change in the solution vector. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.weight_field
member.summary: Used to emphasize an observation. The larger the weight, the more impact it has on the prediction. For coincident observations, assign the largest weight to the most reliable measurement. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.output_type
member.summary: Surface type to store the interpolation results. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.LocalPolynomialInterpolation.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CrossValidation
member.summary: Removes one data location and then predicts the associated data using the data at the rest of the locations. The primary use for this tool is to compare the predicted value to the observed value in order to obtain useful information about some of your model parameters.

member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

member.summary: Stores the cross validation statistics at each location in the geostatistical layer. (Out, Optional)

member.summary: Count (out, Optional)

member.summary: Root Mean Square (out, Optional)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers
member.summary: A moving window predictor that uses the shortest distance between points so that points on either side of the line barriers are connected.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)
Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.in_features
member.summary: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.z_field
member.summary: Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.out_ga_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer produced. This layer is required output only if no output raster is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.out_raster
member.summary: The output raster. This raster is required output only if no output geostatistical layer is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.in_barrier_features
member.summary: Absolute barrier features using non Euclidean distances rather than "line of sight" distances. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.kernel_function
member.summary: The kernel function used in the simulation. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.bandwidth
member.summary: Used to specify the maximum distance at which data points are used for prediction. With increasing bandwidth, prediction bias increases and prediction variance decreases. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.power
member.summary: Sets the order of the polynomial (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.ridge
member.summary: Used for the numerical stabilization of the solution of the system of linear equations. It does not influence predictions in the case of regularly distributed data without barriers. Predictions for areas in which the data are located near the feature barrier or isolated by the barriers can be unstable and tend to require relatively large ridge parameter values. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.KernelInterpolationWithBarriers.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers
member.summary: Uses a kernel that is based upon the heat equation and allows one to use a combination of raster and feature datasets to act as a barrier.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)
Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.in_features
member.summary: The input point features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.z_field
member.summary: Field that holds a height or magnitude value for each point. This can be a numeric field or the Shape field if the input features contains z-values or m-values. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.out_ga_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer produced. This layer is required output only if no output raster is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.out_raster
member.summary: The output raster. This raster is required output only if no output geostatistical layer is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.in_barrier_features
member.summary: Absolute barrier features using non Euclidean distances rather than "line of sight" distances. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.bandwidth
member.summary: Used to specify the maximum distance at which data points are used for prediction. With increasing bandwidth, prediction bias increases and prediction variance decreases. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.number_iterations
member.summary: The iteration count controls the accuracy of the numerical solution because the model solves the diffusion equation numerically. The larger this number, the more accurate the predictions, yet the longer the processing time. And, the more complex the barrier's geometry and the larger the bandwidth, the more iterations are required for an accurate predictions. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.weight_field
member.summary: Used to emphasize an observation. The larger the weight, the more impact it has on the prediction. For coincident observations, assign the largest weight to the most reliable measurement. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.in_additive_barrier_raster
member.summary: The travel distance from one raster cell to the next based on this formula: (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.in_cumulative_barrier_raster
member.summary: The travel distance from one raster cell to the next based on this formula: (difference between cost values in the neighboring cells) + (distance between cell centers) (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DiffusionInterpolationWithBarriers.in_flow_barrier_raster
member.summary: A flow barrier is used when interpolating data with preferential direction of data variation, based on this formula: (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions
member.summary: Uses one of five basis functions to process each measured sample value, thus creating an exact interpolation surface.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)
Z value field (in)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.in_features
member.summary: The input features containing the z-values to be interpolated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.z_field
member.summary: Z value field (in)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.out_ga_layer
member.summary: The geostatistical layer produced. This layer is required output only if no output raster is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.out_raster
member.summary: The output raster. This raster is required output only if no output geostatistical layer is requested. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.cell_size
member.summary: The cell size at which the output raster will be created. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.search_neighborhood
member.summary: Defines which surrounding points will be used to control the output. There are two options: STANDARD and SMOOTH. Standard is the default. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.radial_basis_functions
member.summary: Available Radial basis functions. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.RadialBasisFunctions.small_scale_parameter
member.summary: Used to calculate the weights assigned to the points located in the moving window. Each of the radial basis functions has a parameter that controls the degree of small-scale variation of the surface. The (optimal?) parameter is determined by finding the value that minimizes the root mean square prediction error (RMSPE). (In, Optional)

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CreateSpatiallyBalancedPoints
member.summary: Generates a set of sample points based on inclusion probabilities resulting in a spatially balanced, i.e. maximized, and thus more efficient sample design.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CreateSpatiallyBalancedPoints.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: This raster defines the inclusion probabilities for each location in the area of interest. The location values range from 0 (low inclusion probability) to 1 (high inclusion probability). (In, Required)
Specify how many sample locations to generate. (In, Required)
The output feature class contains the selected sample locations and their inclusion probabilities. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CreateSpatiallyBalancedPoints.in_probability_raster
member.summary: This raster defines the inclusion probabilities for each location in the area of interest. The location values range from 0 (low inclusion probability) to 1 (high inclusion probability). (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CreateSpatiallyBalancedPoints.number_output_points
member.summary: Specify how many sample locations to generate. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CreateSpatiallyBalancedPoints.out_feature_class
member.summary: The output feature class contains the selected sample locations and their inclusion probabilities. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.CreateSpatiallyBalancedPoints.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork
member.summary: Uses inter alia, the Standard Error of Prediction surface on a predefined geostatistical kriging layer to determine where new locations are required or which can be removed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input a geostatistical layer resulting from a Kriging model. (In, Required)
Specify how many sample locations to generate. (In, Required)
The name of the output feature class. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.in_geostat_layer
member.summary: Input a geostatistical layer resulting from a Kriging model. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.number_output_points
member.summary: Specify how many sample locations to generate. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.out_feature_class
member.summary: The name of the output feature class. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.selection_criteria
member.summary: Methods to densify a sampling network. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.threshold
member.summary: The threshold value used to densify the sampling network, applicable only when STDERR_THRESHOLD or QUARTILE_THRESHOLD selection criteria are used. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.in_weight_raster
member.summary: A raster used to determine which locations to weight for preference. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.in_candidate_point_features
member.summary: Sample locations to pick from. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.DensifySamplingNetwork.inhibition_distance
member.summary: Used to prevent any samples being placed within this distance from each other. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable
member.summary: Extracts cell values from a set of rasters to a table, based on a point or polygon feature class.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The points or polygon features to be created. (In, Required)
The rasters must all have the same extent, coordinate system, and cell size. (In, Required)

The output table contains a record for each point and each raster that has data. If polygon features are input, they are converted to points which coincide with the raster cell centers. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.in_features
member.summary: The points or polygon features to be created. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.in_rasters
member.summary: The rasters must all have the same extent, coordinate system, and cell size. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.out_table
member.summary: The output table contains a record for each point and each raster that has data. If polygon features are input, they are converted to points which coincide with the raster cell centers. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.out_raster_names_table
member.summary: Saves the names of the Input rasters to disc. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.add_warning_field
member.summary: Records if input features are partially or completely covered by the Input rasters. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.GeostatisticalAnalystTools.ExtractValuesToTable.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.
